About the Product: Bajra flour is made from small round grains of black millet, also called bajra. The flour is greyish in colour and has a slightly nutty flavour. Since it is a heat-producing ingredient, it is commonly used in winters. Nutritional Facts: Calories: 361, Carbs: 68 g, Fat: 5 g, Protein: 12 g. Benefits: Bajra is rich in magnesium, which helps keep the heart-healthy. It has potassium, which dilates blood vessels, allowing blood to flow more easily. This helps reduce overall blood pressure. Bajra also has fiber that helps reduce LDL, or bad, cholesterol. How to Use: Bajra flour is used to make rotis, puris and paratha. It also can be used to make khakhra, chakli and khichdi. about_the_product:
About the Product:
Premium Kachi Ghani Mustard Oil Pouch from Sri Sri Tattva is an edible oil, Free from Argemone Oil, Fortified with Vitamin A and D. The Kachi Ghani Mustard Oil produced by Sri Sri Tattva has the essential oil content of Mustard Oil which acts as a preservative, displays antibacterial and antioxidant properties. product_USP: Walnut, Akhrot, Walnut In Shell, Akhrot In Shell
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Walnut Kernels not only add crunch and taste to a dish, but they are loaded with nutritional benefits too. They are a rich source of heart-healthy fats and an excellent source of those hard-to-find omega 3 fatty acids. Walnuts are vacuum packaged to retain freshness, taste, and texture ensuring quality. All products are hygienically packed in a facility meeting food safety standards, product details diet balance- adding walnuts to your diet may help you to maintain your ideal weight over time. Researchers showed that consuming walnuts on a regular basis may help you to reduce stress and age growth as it is found to consist of vitamin E and antioxidants multivitamins- walnuts contain several neuroprotective compounds, including vitamin E, vitamin B, folate, melatonin, omega-3 fats, and antioxidants health benefits-walnuts are primarily made up of polyunsaturated fat.
Ingredients:
Californian Walnut Akhrot In Shell
How to Use:
Walnuts have a wealth of good kinds of fats - polyunsaturated fats, which are better than saturated fats.
They also have a high amount of omega-3 fatty acids.
Walnuts are crushed often to sprinkle over salads, and desserts, particularly sundaes and other ice creams and are also used as seafood toppings.
Best accompanied with tea or for an on-the-go munch.
Pop some before hitting the gym or spruce up your salad

About the Product:
Prepared from farm-fresh garlic, Dabur Hommade garlic is stone ground and fine-textured. The garlic used to make the paste is sourced from Gujarat. It comes in a unique airlock pack that retains the scintillating aroma and freshness, both over a long period of time. It gives your everyday recipes the same delicious flavour and aroma minus the labour involved in grinding. There are no added colours in this product. Our Hommade range is an inspiration for seasoned cooks, experimental folks who like to try cooking and aspiring chefs-to-be.
Our Garlic Paste contains no Added Colo.It is thick and grainy, providing the texture of freshly ground paste at Home.
2 tbsp of our Hommade Garlic paste is equivalent to 2 medium-sized bulbs of Garlic, make sure you use in recipes accordingly.
Speaking of recipes, it is great to be used in Rajma, Choley, Biryanis, Sambhar, Matar Paneer, Malai Kofta.
Freshest ingredients always - the taste of Hommade!
Ingredients:
Garlic, Water, Salt, Acidity, Turmeric, Regulator (INS 296) and Stabilizer (INS 415). Contains Permitted Class II Preservative (INS 211).
How to Use:
Use Hommade Garlic Paste in Rajma, chole, sambhar, biryanis, matar paneer, Malai kofta or any other recipe as a substitute of garlic. 
Other Hommade options include ginger, ginger-garlic, and tamarind paste, as well as coconut milk, tomato puree, capsicum, and lemoneez.

product_desc: Chaat Masala - Spice Blend For Papdi, Tikki & Bhel Puri
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Aashirvaad ensures that only excellent quality ingredients reach your kitchen and Aashirvaad Chaat Masala stays true to that promise. This tasty and tangy spice mix is a kitchen staple, the difference-maker for a wide range of dishes. Its signature ‘chatpata’ flavour is sure to get your taste buds racing. Just sprinkle it atop some of your favourite dishes like Pani Puri, Bhel Puri, Papdi Chaat, Tikki Chaat, Dahi Bhalla, etc and experience it for yourself! An exquisite spice blend of Chaat masala, it is made from locally sourced ingredients from across India. Experts have carefully selected them to ensure the right aroma, pungency, quality, and consistency. The pack also consists of Aroma Locked Technology – re-sealable zip lock pouch inside which ensures that the masala has long-lasting freshness. Enjoy the right balance of aromas and flavours as Aashirvaad Chaat Masala adds the magical combination of sweet, salty, and tangy to your all-time favourite chaat food.
Features:
Aashirvaad Chaat Masala: It is an exquisite spice blend that brings alive the aroma and taste of every dishThe Perfect Chatpata Flavour: This perfect spice blend adds the delicious combination of sweet, salty and tangy to chaat foodMade with High Quality Ingredients: Aashirvaad Chaat Masala is made from the choicest ingredientsSourced from Farmers: The ingredients are sourced locally across India and have been selected by expertsRe-Sealable Pouch: It comes with a re-sealable zip lock pouch inside which helps retain long-lasting freshness

About the Product:
Experience the essence of nutrition with our Organic Whole Wheat Atta. Milled from premium organic wheat, this finely ground flour embodies purity and health. Perfect for creating wholesome rotis and chapatis, it ensures each meal is rich in fibre and essential nutrients. About the Product:
Whole wheat atta retains more nutrients and dietary fibre compared to refined wheat flour. Whole wheat atta has a slightly coarse texture and a nutty flavour due to the presence of bran and germ. It is commonly used in Indian cuisine to make chapatis (flatbreads), rotis, parathas, and other baked goods. Whole wheat atta is valued for its higher nutritional content and is preferred by those looking for healthier alternatives to refined flour.
How to Use:
It can be used for making chapattis, puri, paratha, kulcha, katchori, cake, cookies etc.To make roti add oil, salt and water as required and knead into a smooth soft dough.Make a small to medium ball and flatten it out and start roalling it in a flat circle.Put in on hot tava and cook on both sides. Once ready serve it hot with dal or any veggie dish.

Organic Mamra Almonds from the house of Organic Tattva is a species of tree native to Iran and surrounding countries. The ancient remains of almonds were discovered in the Levant area. They lower LDL (bad) cholesterol and are packed with vitamin E, magnesium and potassium, which helps oxygen and nutrients flow more freely through the blood. About the Product:
Dal is the most essential food consumed by Indians and packed with profuse nutrition. Urad dal is paramount in proteins and Vitamin-B and a rich source of potassium and iron. It is free from artificial coloring and processing. They are best for pregnant women, supplying them with the nutrition and heals pain and inflammation. Urad dal boost energy, refine digestion along with enhancing your skin and hair, and keeps your heart healthy. Ural Dal has a low glycemic index because of complex carbohydrates, therefore we can call dals diabetic-friendly!
Ingredients:
Unpolished Pesticide Free Urad Dal Whole
Nutritional Facts:
Protein 23.1g Minerals 3.2g Total Fat 1.7g Total Dietary fibre 11.9g Insoluble dietary fibre 7.6g Soluble dietary fibre 4.4g Carbohydrates 51g Energy 324Kcal
How to Use:
Wash (whole / dals) pulses, it is best to rinse them under running water. Put your grains to wash in a bowl and hold it under running water. Rub the grains with your hands gently. Rinse it until the water becomes clear.                                                                                                 Use a large saucepan or cooking container, as pulses double or triple in volume during cooking. (Dry pulses will yield approximately 2-3 times their original amount when cooked.) Bring water to a boil, cover tightly, reduce heat and simmer until pulses are just tender and not mushy.

About the Product:
Safawi Dates, the jewel of Arabian dates, captivate with their exquisite taste and luxurious texture. These dark, luscious gems offer a sensory journey that delights the palate.
Renowned for their natural sweetness and caramel-like flavour, Safawi Dates are a true indulgence. With every bite, you'll experience a burst of rich, earthy notes that leave a lingering, delightful aftertaste. Their soft and chewy texture adds to the pleasure, making each mouthful a moment of pure bliss.
But Safawi Dates aren't just a delicious treat; they're also a powerhouse of nutrients. Packed with fibre, vitamins, and minerals, they offer a wholesome and nourishing snack. These little wonders provide a natural energy boost, making them a perfect choice for an afternoon pick-me-up or a quick on-the-go snack.
Whether enjoyed on their own, paired with a cup of aromatic coffee, or incorporated into your favourite recipes, Safawi Dates add a touch of luxury to any occasion. Their versatility shines in both sweet and savoury dishes, from decadent desserts to savoury stews and salads.
The process of picking dates involves careful monitoring of the palm trees for ripeness. Ripe date bunches are selected, cut with precision, and sorted based on quality. The harvested dates are then cleaned, packaged, and transported for sale. This ensures that only the finest and freshest dates reach consumers.
Ingredients:
Dates

Natural Ghee- 100% Natural Cow Ghee is packed with the nutrition that your body needs. Our Cow Ghee is highly nutritious and contains a rich and authentic flavour and natural aroma. It is a 100% natural and pure cow ghee. It has no preservatives or artificial colors.
Lab Tested: Our Desi ghee from Land of Lord Krishna is Lab Tested & certified by FSSAI, US FDA & International food safety standards. It is pure, preservative free and chemical free.
Cow ghee is a rich source of fat-soluble vitamins including A, D, E and K, which is essential for our body but can’t make for itself. These vitamins perform many essential functions. Similarly, cow ghee is an excellent source of essential fatty acids, which cannot be synthesized in our body. And it is a good source of Omega 3 fatty acid.
Richness Of Auric Ghee: Cow Ghee has excellent properties for balancing Vata(air) and Pitta related doshas.It is used as base for preparing Ayurvedic medicines, because of the fact ghee has ability to digest in short period, which help to transport medicine without any change called as “yogawahi” action in Ayurveda. In Ayurveda, ghee is placed under most “Sattvic foods” and which help to promote positivity, growth and for conscious.
Aids To Health: Cow ghee is applicable in all internal body mechanisms and considered in Ayurveda as ’amrita’(nectar). It had several health benefits such as slows the aging process, enhances the body immune system, facilitates the bowel movement, improve the health of the teeth & gums, prevent chronic cough issues, and also disorders of eyes.

product_USP: Grown without use of any chemicals, pesticides or insecticides

About the Product:
Pine nuts are full of minerals and vitamins, which play an important role to improve your overall health.
The shell must be removed before the pine nut can be eaten and have a long shelf life if kept dry.
They can be eaten raw, have a soft texture and a sweet buttery flavour and are especially good in salads, pesto sauce and deserts.
They are deliciously toasted as this brings out their flavour and adds a little extra crunch.
Nutritional Facts:
Calories: 673,
Carbs: 13 g,
Fat: 68 g,
Protein: 14 g.
Benefits:
Pine nuts are high in vitamin K, phosphorus, magnesium, zinc and manganese, which contribute to the maintenance of normal bones.
Pine nuts are also high in polyunsaturated fat, vitamins B1, E, and minerals such as iron and copper.
In addition, they are a source of fiber, potassium, vitamins B2 and B3.
How to Use:
Pine nuts may be eaten raw but are usually roasted or toasted.
As with most nuts, toasting brings out more flavour.
Heating nuts will intensify the flavour of the nut by warming the naturally occurring nut oils.
You can toast the nuts in the skillet, oven, or even microwave.

As kids, our mothers gave us a handful of almonds for breakfast every day because they are good for growing kids. Of course, mothers are always right! True Elements Californian Almonds are handpicked, premium quality, 100% natural & whole almonds. We internationally source them from the best vendor available in the market. They are hygienically cleaned & have no residues. Our almonds are highly nutritious nuts that are loaded with essential fats, dietary fibre, protein, omega 3 Fatty acids & more. They are also low in glycemic index. 
Adding a handful of almonds to your diet is a great way to provide your body with essential vitamins and minerals. From helping you manage weight to lower your cholesterol, from promoting hormonal balance in women to reducing headaches, these tiny nuts are jam-packed in health benefits for everyone! These nuts can be incorporated into your daily diet. Top them on your oatmeal, salads, smoothies, etc., make almond milk to enjoy some dairy-free milk.

How to Use:
Pav Bhaji:

Heat 2 tbsp. of oil in a pan, add 2 tbsp. of garlic paste and 2 chopped onions, and cook till it's soft.
Add 2 chopped tomatoes, 1 tbsp. bb ROYAL Pav Bhaji Masala, chilli powder and salt to taste.
Add 500g boiled vegetables like mashed potatoes, green peas, and cauliflower and cook it for 2-3 minutes.
Add 1 tbsp. of butter and sprinkle chopped coriander leaves. Serve hot with bread/pav and chopped raw onions with a dash of lime.

About the Product:
Safe harvest Little Millet Rice is procured from small and marginal farmer producer collectives from South Tamil Nadu. It has been carefully grown to ensure that you get safe food without synthetic pesticides and without using genetically modified seeds. All products of Safe harvest are tested in FSSAI accredited laboratories for the presence of 149 pesticide residues and a Minimum Residual Level report is obtained. Also, our millet rice is parboiled and unpolished that helps in retaining the essential nutrients. They are easily digestible, highly nutritious, and gluten-free and has a lesser percentage of glucose when compared to rice and thus lowers the risk of diabetes. Little millet has 7. 7% protein and 67% carbohydrate when compared to paddy rice that has only 6. 8% protein but 78. 2% carbohydrates. Eating millets is a step towards sustainable cropping practices as millet is not a water-intensive crop like rice or wheat. Little millet rice has high fibre content and helps reduce fat deposit. It helps to prevent constipation and is extremely beneficial to gastric health. Recommended for making such as Biriyani, Kheer.
Nutritional Facts:
Energy--378kcal
Carbohydrates,g--67
Protein--7.7
Fat,g--4.7
Saturated fat--0
Sugar--0g

Little millet

About the Product:
We Strive To Bring Sustainable And Innovative Quality Products By Applying Traditional Techniques Like Sprouting, Cold Milling And Fermenting To Ensure The Highest Nutrition Retention With Great Taste For Your Cooking. 
The millets have been sprouted, dried, mildly roasted to bring out the aroma and cold-milled to retain the important nutrients.
The Flour Is Not Heated, Contains The Goodness Of Foxtail Millet, Pearl Millet, Kodo Millet And Barnyard Millet. Millets Are Believed To Have Been Cultivated Since Pre-Historic Times And Is One Of The Worlds Earliest Food Plants Used By Humans. 
It Is Naturally Gluten Free And Is Non-Acid Forming. Millets Are Alkalizing Foods Which Help In Preventing Chronic Diseases.
Weight : 500 gm
Store under cool and dry condition. Transfer contents to an airtight container after opening.
Ingredients:
Foxtail Millet, Pearl Millet, Kodo Millet and Barnyard Millet
Nutritional Facts:
Millets are alkalizing grain, gluten free and naturally nutrient dense. 
It is rich in minerals like calcium, copper, iron, magnesium, phosphorus, potassium, and selenium as well as essential vitamins like folate, pantothenic acid, niacin, riboflavin, and Vitamins B6, C, E, and K. 
Sprouting the millets increases the nutrition content, and also breaks down the nutrients for easier absorption. It helps to improve cholesterol levels, the fiber content of millet help support heart health by reducing blood pressure. It helps support a healthy and regular digestion.
How to Use:
With mixed millet flour, one can make delicious rotis and puris.
Add 2 tbsp of the mix to a cup of boiling milk or water and stir continuously. Add jaggery powder or other sweetener of choice to enhance taste.
Can be added to butter milk with a pinch of natural salt.
Can be enjoyed as an energy drink for breakfast or anytime during the day.

From the Brand:
About the Product
Fresho Signature presents an array of dry fruits, seeds and nuts apart from the ordinary to give you the best of the best to indulge. Why munch on junk food when you can just pop in a handful of this healthy snack. To give you a variety, this wholesome mixed pack contains candied fruits, salted nuts and roasted seeds. It makes a great snack for someone who is always on the go and boosts their energy.
The candied dry fruits, roasted seeds and the salted nuts assortment is packed with nutrients that aid in curbing hunger and keeping an eye on your weight. Pineapple is rich in Vitamin C, whereas black grape and strawberry are packed with antioxidants that boost immunity. Almonds are known to improve bone health and peanuts carry a great amount of protein. When it comes to the seeds we have opted for you, sunflower seeds, melon seeds and pumpkin seeds hold a good source of fibre and protein that help control the body weight. This nourishing snack pack benefits overall health and keeps you active.

Pineapple, Black Grape, Strawberry, Sulphurless Sugar, Almond, Peanut, Sunflower Seed, Melon Seed and Pumpkin Seeds.

Can be snacked on directly.
The candied fruits and salted nuts can be used as dessert toppings, cake decorations and to prepare sweets.
The mix is perfect to enhance salads.
Add it to your breakfast cereals or smoothie.

Urban Platter Almond Flour is keto-friendly, naturally protein-rich, blanched almond fine powder. It is used in puddings, kheer, sweets, badam-katli, grain-free baking mixes, in muffins, in baking cookies etc.
It is excellent to give almond profile to your products.
It is made from finest quality California almonds, sourced from Blue Diamond Almonds of USA.
Urban Platter was founded with a vision to deliver simply good food for people who seek a personal connection with what they eat.
Sit back, relax and whip up delicious delights!
Urban platter has a variety of everyday essentials and gourmet edibles from around the world.

carbohydrate--5 g

Storage and Uses:
Use it for adding a buttery flavour to your pancakes, muffins, cakes & cookies, puddings, kheer, sweets, badam-katli, grain-free baking mixes.
Store this product in a cool, dry place, away from sunlight and avoid using a wet/moist spoon.
Keep the pouch Zip locked for fresh experience every time.
No refrigeration Required.

product_desc: Sabji Masala - Ethnic Spice Blend With Authentic Taste
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Aashirvaad, the brand that you love and trust, ensures that excellent quality products reach your kitchen and Aashirvaad Sabji Masala stays true that. If it’s convenient and consistency in your dishes that you’re looking for, you can’t go wrong with this spice blend. Acting as a genuine pillar of taste and aroma for a wide range of dishes, trust Aashirvaad Sabji Masala to ensure the ‘S’ in Sabji stands for “Scintillating!” An ethnic spice blend of Sabji masala, it is made from locally sourced ingredients from across India. Experts have carefully selected them to ensure the right aroma, pungency, quality, and consistency. The pack also consists of Aroma Locked Technology – re-sealable zip lock pouch inside which ensures that the masala has long-lasting freshness. Enjoy the right balance of aromas and flavours as Aashirvaad Sabji Masala adds an authentic taste and colour of traditional cooking and elevates the taste of your everyday dishes.
Features:
Aashirvaad Sabji Masala: It is an exquisite spice blend that brings alive the aroma and taste of every dishAuthentic Taste & Aroma: Elevate the flavour of your everyday sabji dishes with this fragrant and flavourful spice blendMade with High Quality Ingredients: Aashirvaad Sabji Masala is made from the choicest ingredientsSourced Directly from Farmers: The ingredients are sourced locally across India and have been selected by expertsRe-Sealable Pouch: It comes with a re-sealable zip lock pouch inside which helps retain long-lasting freshness
